name: Flippy Kunai
description:
This was my entry for Aprils #1Gam game jam. 

This one was made over the space of about 6 hours as I left the project until the last Sunday of April. I wanted to prototype an idea I had for a small AR app but due to time constraints I took the basic mechanics and created a simple take on Flippy Knife. 

Controls

LMB - Click and hold the left mouse button end swipe in the direction you want the knife to travel.

 *** The knife speed is not affected by the speed of your swipe but by the distance across the screen your mouse travels. 

Aim of the game

You get 5 weapons which you use to get the highest score possible. Smaller targets yield more points than larger targets and the centre of a target is worth more than the outside. 

Credits

Programming, Art & Animation: Rob Brooks
